data.expected_result: You can't deny the permission like on desktop and only have the PASSTHROUGH and ALLOW options, or trying to deny will give you a message that you can't
data.short_description: Denying voice channel permissions for any roles you own crashes app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage channels, but don't have the Administrator permission and aren't the owner of - Edit a voice channel - Go to the channel permissions - Add/edit any roles you own (<@&259909937403133953> counts too) - Deny any of its permissions
